# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-10-21

### Added
- Initial release
- Async Python client for IPS Controllers
- ASP.NET ViewState authentication
- HTML parsing with BeautifulSoup
- Support for multiple pool controllers
- Session management with auto-renewal
- Comprehensive error handling
- Data models for pool chemistry readings
- Support for pH, ORP, temperature, chlorine, and status monitoring
